translated: Says John of England John Lackland, in English John Lackland, was born in 1167 in the palace Beaumont in Oxford and died in 1216 at the castle of Newark, in Nottinghamshire in central England.
original: Jean d'Angleterre dit Jean sans Terre, en anglais John Lackland, est né en 1167 au palais Beaumont à Oxford et mort en 1216 au château de Newark, dans le Nottinghamshire, au centre de l'Angleterre.
